A master flick and "a must see" 

Thx anoXmous :)
Reading the book and then will watch the movie...again. Thx!

havent seen the original blu ray but it seems that this one obviously lacks video quality.. and i know that this could be because its an old movie but if you look carefully you'll notice that the video is not crystal clear like most blu rays of classics are, even though they are quite old... its probably because of the waaaay too low bitrate for a 1080p movie : /
